animeDescription: A comedy about a former genius who has now become very eccentric and senile. His family deals with all the crazy problems he and his old friends cause around the neighborhood.  (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Tensai Bakabon', 'Rerere no Tensai Bakabon', 'Ganso Tensai Bakabon']
